title: WOO X celebrates Bitcoin Pizza Day with daily BTC prizes
description: Traders can spin for a chance to win Bitcoin by completing tasks and hitting trading milestones during the 3-day event KINGSTOWN, St. Vincent and the Grenadines , May 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — WOO X, a leading global crypto trading platform, is celebrating Bitcoin Pizza Day with a campaign that literally rewards traders with a […]
